description: Borrowed from Ancient Greek λίθος (líthos, “a stone”), apparently because it is found only in minerals; discovered 1817 by Johan August Arfwedson.

entries.meaning: Lithium oxide, Li2O, used in the manufacture of ceramics and glass.
